name: Aero Porter
synopsis: LEVEL-5 and Yoot Saito, from VIVARIUM Inc., team up to bring you AERO PORTER, an airport simulation and puzzle game that will have you sorting luggage, expanding your airport's operations and avoiding security mishaps! As your airport gains passengers and prestige, you'll be faced with more and more planes to load and luggage to colour code. And that's to say nothing of all the special requests and suspicious packages you'll have to deal with! It's your job to put your airport on the map to help it grow from a few sleepy regional terminals to a bustling international hub. Exchange aircraft with your friends via StreetPass, get those planes loaded and check your luggage on time!
